preparation_instructions:
of the bottom layer: Mix 1 volume of solution A (except MES buffer, NaHCO3,
and agarose) with 1 volume of solution C and add 1% (w/v) agarose type 1, low EEO. After
autoclaving, aseptically fill 1 ml of the suspension in sterile Hungate-type tubes (15 ml
total volume). The bottom layer solidifies in approx. 30 min.
